title: Sampler, 19th century
medium:
Medium: linen and silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique:
inscribed: "When a desire is crowned/ By two faithful hearts/ A key controls them/ And an arrow sustains them./ In this urn rests/ a heart that has suffered/ The harsh chains of love/ and the arrow of forgetfulness./ We live happily/ Love unites us."
provenance: ex. coll. Mrs. Henry E. Coe (Eva Johnston Coe)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe
description: Sampler is divided into compartments with vases, birds, and flowers. Contains the following: "When a desire is crowned/ By two faithful hearts/ A key controls them/ And an arrow sustains them./ In this urn rests/ a heart that has suffered/ The harsh chains of love/ and the arrow of forgetfulness./ We live happily/ Love unites us."  Sampler is edged with tatting.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: linen and silk embroidery, linen foundation
Technique:. Bequest of Mrs. Henry E. Coe. 1941-69-132.
